text: Ndu mba gumgi vuri ga suaŋrim, mbe phara ŋanŋanin mbɨv ŋanŋanɨ thari. Mbe wari wo mbui tɨvi, mbe tuituigip nta ndɨkndɨgɨp, mbe tuituigip wari wo mbui tɨvi ganɨri. Mbe Zisas buna vhuueŋ, mbe guigira ne khothɨgɨp, mbe guigira wari won ndavir harigi ntɨɨri ga ndɨɨi tɨv, mbe guigira ne kaŋgip, mbe khaŋ tɨgɨp thɨgɨ havhargip simtɨgi ndiri.
